frontendProjects.name: KBP Polytechnic Website Clone
frontendProjects.description: A responsive clone of the KBP Polytechnic website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

backendProjects.name: Multiplayer Chess Platform
backendProjects.description: A real-time multiplayer chess game using Node.js, Express, WebSocket, and chess.js for backend functionality.

backendProjects.name: Instagram Clone
backendProjects.description: A backend for an Instagram-like platform using Node.js, providing authentication and media management.

backendProjects.name: Hisab Project
backendProjects.description: A financial tracking system using MongoDB and Mongoose for schema management and data storage.

backendProjects.name: Cab Booking System Backend
backendProjects.description: Backend for a cab booking app that includes booking management and driver assignment functionality.

androidProjects.name: Cab Booking Application
androidProjects.description: An Android-based cab booking app with booking management and driver assignment, developed in Android Studio.
